entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi fails to generate document when using polymorphic types #58213
  • Perf regression: json_spring, json_spring, single_query #58211
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #58210
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, fortunes_spring, mvc #58209
  • blazor.server.js SyntaxError: Unexpected token '{' in Safari Version 16.3. with a Mac Studio using Ventura 13.2 #58212
  • BindProperty attribute should support primary constructors with classes #58205
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58203
  • Blazor Virtualize: root-level scrolling breaks on horizontal scroll enabled in the container #58200

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, updates #58162
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #58201
  • Perf regression: plaintext #58202
  • SwaggerUI broken by primitive return values + endpoint filters #52128
  • Google Auth HttpContext.ChallengeAsync() ends with AuthenticationFailureException in .Net 8 but not .Net 7 #53562
    9.0-rc2
  • High memory usage on an idle web app #53933
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi incomplete/inconsistent enum handling #58195
  • OpenApi: The IEndpointParameterMetadataProvider is not used for Controllers #58178

PullRequests

Created

  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal

Merged

  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57812
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 6.0.36
  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57819
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58179
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Enable TSA/Policheck #58124
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58180
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Enable TSA/Policheck #58125
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58185
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58186
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #58198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • Update November milestones #58208
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #58197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.36

Updated

  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24479.2 #58153
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
